dlentry.dd: Contains predefined XML refactoring operations that pertain to attributes. considers the editing context to get the names and namespaces of the element or attribute for which the contextual menu was invoked, and uses this information to preconfigure some of the parameter values for the selected refactoring operation.
Allows you to change the value of an attribute or insert a new one.
Allows you to remove one or more attributes.
Allows you to rename an attribute.
Allows you to search for a text fragment inside an attribute value and change the fragment to a new value.

Contains predefined XML refactoring operations that pertain to elements. considers the editing context to get the names and namespaces of the element or attribute for which the contextual menu was invoked, and uses this information to preconfigure some of the parameter values for the selected refactoring operation.
Allows you to delete the content of elements.
Allows you to insert new elements.
Allows you to remove the surrounding tags of elements, while keeping the content unchanged.
Allows you to surround elements with element tags.
Allows you to surround the content of elements with element tags.

Contains predefined XML refactoring operations that pertain to XML fragments. considers the editing context to get the names and namespaces of the element or attribute for which the contextual menu was invoked, and uses this information to preconfigure some of the parameter values for the selected refactoring operation.
Allows you to insert an XML fragment.

dt.uicontrol: Replace element content with XML fragment

dlentry.dd: Allows you to replace the content of elements with an XML fragment.
Allows you to replace elements with an XML fragment.
